languages.text: "Номос ведь говорят правильно?" {n}Хор сервиторов, звучащий как один голос, примолкает. Кажется, что Номос ждут вашего ответа... с нетерпением.{/n}
"Did Nomos say it correctly?" {n}The servitor chorus, which sounds as a single voice, falls silent. Nomos appears to be waiting for your response... in eager anticipation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Номос ведь говорят правильно?" {n}Хор сервиторов, звучащий как один голос, примолкает. Кажется, что Номос ждут вашего ответа... с нетерпением.{/n}

"Did Nomos say it correctly?" {n}The servitor chorus, which sounds as a single voice, falls silent. Nomos appears to be waiting for your response... in eager anticipation.{/n}

languages.text: 「ノモスは正しく言いましたか？」{n}サーヴィターが1人の声に聞こえるくらい一斉に言うと黙り込んだ。ノモスはあなたの反応を待っているようだ…大きな期待を抱きながら。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did Nomos say it correctly?" {n}The servitor chorus, which sounds as a single voice, falls silent. Nomos appears to be waiting for your response... in eager anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ノモスは正しく言いましたか？」{n}サーヴィターが1人の声に聞こえるくらい一斉に言うと黙り込んだ。ノモスはあなたの反応を待っているようだ…大きな期待を抱きながら。{/n}

languages.text: “诺莫斯说得对吗？”{n}机仆们齐声开口，几乎融为同一个声音，随后安静下来。诺莫斯似乎在等待你的回应……带着热切的期待。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did Nomos say it correctly?" {n}The servitor chorus, which sounds as a single voice, falls silent. Nomos appears to be waiting for your response... in eager anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “诺莫斯说得对吗？”{n}奴工们齐声开口，几乎融为同一个声音，随后安静下来。诺莫斯似乎在等待你的回应……带着热切的期待。{/n}

languages.text: "Haben Nomos das richtig gesagt?" {n}Der Chor der Servitoren, der wie eine einzige Stimme klingt, verstummt. Nomos scheint auf deine Antwort zu warten ... mit großer Vorfreude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did Nomos say it correctly?" {n}The servitor chorus, which sounds as a single voice, falls silent. Nomos appears to be waiting for your response... in eager anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Haben Nomos das richtig gesagt?" {n}Der Chor der Servitoren, der wie eine einzige Stimme klingt, verstummt. Nomos scheint auf deine Antwort zu warten ... mit großer Vorfreude.{/n}

languages.text: « Avons-nous formulé ces propos correctement ? » {n}Le chœur de servitors, dont les nombreuses voix ne font qu'une, se tait. Nomos semble attendre impatiemment votre réponse...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did Nomos say it correctly?" {n}The servitor chorus, which sounds as a single voice, falls silent. Nomos appears to be waiting for your response... in eager anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Avons-nous formulé ces propos correctement ? » {n}Le chœur de servitors, dont les nombreuses voix ne font qu'une, se tait. Nomos semble attendre impatiemment votre réponse...{/n}

languages.text: «¿Lo han dicho Nomos correctamente?». {n}El coro de servidores, que habla con una sola voz, enmudece. Nomos parece aguardar tu respuesta... con suma expectación.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did Nomos say it correctly?" {n}The servitor chorus, which sounds as a single voice, falls silent. Nomos appears to be waiting for your response... in eager anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Lo han dicho Nomos correctamente?». {n}El coro de servidores, que habla con una sola voz, enmudece. Nomos parece aguardar tu respuesta... con suma expectación.{/n}

languages.text: "Nomos doğru söyleyebildi mi?" {n}Tek bir ağızdan konuşan hizmetör korosu sessizleşiyor. Nomos, cevap vermeni bekliyor gibi görünüyor... Hevesle beklediğini seziyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did Nomos say it correctly?" {n}The servitor chorus, which sounds as a single voice, falls silent. Nomos appears to be waiting for your response... in eager anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nomos doğru söyleyebildi mi?" {n}Tek bir ses olarak yükselen hizmetör korosu sessizleşiyor. Nomos, senin cevabını bekliyor gibi görünüyor... Hevesli beklentisini seziyorsun.{/n}
